name: Ed Kenley Ford Accessories
description: If you don't see a product here you are interested in let us know!

name: Paint and Interior Protection
description: With a commitment to innovation, we have imbedded technology into our manufacturing process for both exterior and interior surfaces. Over the last ten years, the Company has sold nearly nine million contracts and manages approximately three million warranties on new and preowned vehicles.

name: BakFlip MX4 Tonneau Cover
description: Keep valuables secure and your truck in top condition with the BAK BAKFlip MX4 Aluminum Tonneau Cover. Offering advanced durability against UV radiation and scratches, its lightweight yet heavy-duty design features premier density foam. The aluminum construction sports a sleek, flat-matte black finish. Tailgate-compatible and made in the USA, it comes with a 5-Year Warranty.

name: B&W Turnoverball
description: Instead of worrying about where to store the ball when you're not using it, the Turnoverball let's you store it where you need it.

name: Wheel Well Liners
description: Heavy-duty liners help cover up and shield body-colored parts and numerous underpinnings within the rear wheelhouses

name: Spray On Bed Liner
description: Protect your truck with ReflexÂ® Spray-On Truck Liners. This durable, thick coating guards against scratches, dents, and rust while providing a non-slip surface for cargo. Versatile and long-lasting, Reflex comes in various vibrant colors and is suitable for multiple applications beyond just truck beds.

name: ClearShield Paint Protection
description: Preserve your vehicle's finish with our Xpel Paint Protection Film, also known as "clearbra." This virtually invisible, self-healing polyurethane film guards against chips, scratches, and scuffs. Ideal for maintaining your car's glossy appearance and resale value, the film repairs minor damage within minutes. Certified installation available.
var2: $1,997 - Full Hood, Full Fender and Front

name: Air Bags
description: Suspension air bags, also known as air springs or helper springs, are inflatable devices installed between a truck's frame and suspension. Designed to enhance load-carrying capacity, stability, and ride comfort, they adjust to varying loads and road conditions by inflating or deflating. When a truck carries heavy cargo or tows a trailer, the air bags prevent sagging, reduce suspension fatigue, and improve overall handling. Controlled manually or via onboard compressors, these air bags adapt in real-time, ensuring a level ride, reducing the risk of bottoming out, and optimizing safety and performance for loaded trucks.

name: Bed Extender
description: Increase your truck's cargo capacity with our Bed Extender. Made from durable materials, it extends beyond the tailgate to accommodate longer items like kayaks or lumber. Some models offer vertical positioning for smaller cargo. Ideal for both recreational and professional use, it keeps items secure during transit.

name: Rubber Bed Mat
description: Rubber bed mat for a truck provides durable protection against cargo movement, scratches, and dents. Made from tough rubber, it offers a non-slip surface, ensuring items stay in place during transit. Easily installed and weather-resistant, it's an essential accessory for preserving truck bed integrity.

name: Bed Rug
description: A bed rug offers a plush, carpet-like layer for truck beds, combining luxury with functionality. Crafted from durable materials, it shields against impacts while providing a cushioned surface. Perfect for delicate cargo, it prevents scratches and ensures items remain undamaged. A blend of style and protection for any truck enthusiast.

name: Ford Brake Controller
description: A brake controller is an essential electronic device installed in a vehicle towing a trailer. It regulates the power supply to the trailer's electric brakes, ensuring synchronized stopping of both the towing vehicle and the trailer. Depending on the load and driving conditions, the driver can adjust the braking force. There are two primary types: time-delayed and proportional. Time-delayed controllers apply a predetermined braking force, while proportional ones adjust based on the towing vehicle's braking intensity. Proper use of a brake controller enhances safety, reduces wear on brakes, and provides smoother stops.

name: Bug Shield
description: A bug shield, also known as a hood deflector or bug deflector, is a curved accessory attached to the front of a vehicle, primarily on the hood's edge. Made from durable materials like acrylic or polycarbonate, its purpose is to redirect airflow and, consequently, bugs, small stones, and other debris upward and over the vehicle, preventing them from hitting the windshield or damaging the paint. Aside from its functional benefits, a bug shield also enhances the vehicle's aesthetic appeal, giving it a sleek and polished look while providing protection.

name: Canvasback Cargo Cover
description: A Canvasback cargo cover is a premium liner tailored for vehicle trunks and cargo areas. Made from rugged, water-resistant fabric, it shields the interior from spills, dirt, and wear. Precision-fit to each vehicle model, it offers edge-to-edge protection, ensuring the underlying carpet remains pristine. Ideal for pet owners, adventurers, and daily drivers seeking superior interior defense.

name: Fender Flares
description: Fender flares are stylish, protective extensions for vehicle wheel wells. Designed to enhance a vehicle's aesthetic, they also provide an extra shield against mud, stones, and road debris. Made from durable materials, they complement larger tires and off-road setups. Fender flares not only amplify a vehicle's rugged appeal but also help in maintaining its exterior cleanliness and integrity.

name: Floor Mats
description: All-weather floor mats are designed to provide robust protection against dirt, water, snow, and spills inside vehicles. Made from durable, resilient materials, they contour to the floor, ensuring maximum coverage. Their textured surface prevents slippage, making them a must-have for maintaining a clean and safeguarded vehicle interior, regardless of the season or weather conditions.

name: 60 Gallon Fuel Tank - Super Duty
description: A 60-gallon fuel replacement tank is a high-capacity storage solution designed to extend a vehicle's range between fill-ups. Made from robust materials, it ensures durability and resistance against potential leaks. Ideal for long-haul travelers, off-road enthusiasts, and commercial drivers, this tank minimizes frequent fuel stops, offering convenience and enhanced journey efficiency.

name: Anderson Hitch
description: An Andersen Hitch is a revolutionary towing solution, renowned for its lightweight design and exceptional strength. Crafted from quality materials, it offers smooth towing with anti-sway and anti-bounce features. Its unique design facilitates quick installation and adjustments, ensuring safety and ease of use. Perfect for campers, trailers, and RVs, the Andersen Hitch redefines towing performance and reliability.

name: Leather Seats by Katzkin
description: Katzkin leather seats are synonymous with luxury and customization in vehicle interiors. Offering a transformative upgrade over standard factory seats, Katzkin ensures top-tier craftsmanship and a tailored fit. Made from high-quality leather, these seats provide durability, comfort, and a touch of elegance. Whether seeking a sleek modern design or a classic finish, Katzkin's attention to detail elevates the driving experience to a new level of sophistication.
price: $1,895 - Two rows - add $200 for heat - and $900 for vented
var1: $2,925 - Three row - add $500 for heat - and $900 for vented
var2: Additional colors - Two row $150/color - Three row $250/color
var3: Wings Package - Two row add $200 - Three row add $350
var4: Diamond Stitching two rows add $250 - Barracuda Perf two rows add $150
var5: XT two rows add $250 - Outlaw two rows add $250

name: Level Kits
description: A level kit for trucks is a modification tool designed to raise the front end, aligning it with the rear for a balanced stance. Made from durable materials, it not only enhances the truck's aesthetic appeal but also provides additional ground clearance, accommodating larger tires.

name: Lift Kit - Bronco
description: A lift kit for the Bronco is a comprehensive modification package designed to elevate its stance and enhance off-road capabilities. Tailored specifically for this iconic SUV, the kit includes components like extended shocks, spacers, and brackets. By raising the Bronco's chassis, it allows for the fitting of larger tires, resulting in improved ground clearance and obstacle navigation.

name: Mud Flaps
description: Mud flaps, also known as splash guards, are protective accessories affixed behind a vehicle's wheels. Crafted from durable materials like rubber or plastic, they shield the vehicle, other road users, and pedestrians  from water, mud, stones, and debris thrown by rotating tires. Offering both functionality and style, mud flaps can be custom-designed or logo-embellished, ensuring a vehicle remains cleaner while minimizing potential damage to its paintwork and enhancing its aesthetic appeal.  *price is per front/back set

name: Ford Remote Start
description: A remote start system allows vehicle owners to start their car or truck from a distance, usually via a key fob or smartphone app. Especially valuable in extreme weather conditions, a remote start ensures the engine and interior are at optimal temperatures, providing convenience and extending the lifespan of the engine by promoting smoother starts.

name: Nerf Bars
description: Nerf bars are tubular side steps mounted on the sides of trucks and SUVs, facilitating easier entry and exit. Made from sturdy materials like steel or aluminum, they offer a step-up while adding a rugged aesthetic to the vehicle. Beyond aesthetics and convenience, nerf bars also provide an added layer of protection against potential dings or scrapes from obstacles or other vehicles. Available in various finishes and styles.

name: Retrax Tonneau Cover
description: Retrax tonneau cover is a premium retractable bed cover designed for pickup trucks. Known for its robust construction and seamless operation, the Retrax offers superior protection for cargo against weather elements and potential theft. Crafted from durable materials, it smoothly glides into a canister, providing full bed access without removal. With its sleek, low-profile design, the Retrax tonneau cover not only ensures cargo security but also enhances fuel efficiency and elevates the truck's aesthetic appeal.

name: Window TInt
description: Window tint is a thin laminate film applied to the interior or exterior of glass surfaces in vehicles. Serving multiple purposes, it provides privacy, reduces harmful UV radiation, prevents glare, and helps regulate interior temperatures.

name: Bed Wiring
description: The Bed Wiring Kit for trailers ensures a secure electrical connection between your towing vehicle and trailer. This all-in-one kit includes a weather-resistant wiring harness, connectors, and relays for brake, turn signal, and running lights.

name: 4" and 6" Lifts
description: Elevate your truck's performance and aesthetics with our Truck Lift Kit. This complete package includes high-quality struts, shocks, and spacers for enhanced durability and stability. The kit provides increased ground clearance and allows for larger tires, making off-road adventures a breeze.

name: Westin Black Stylized Running Boards
description: Upgrade your vehicle with Westin Black Stylized Running Boards. Crafted from high-quality materials, these sleek, black boards offer a secure stepping surface and an elegant look. Designed for durability and style, they provide easy vehicle entry and exit while enhancing your vehicle's aesthetic appeal.

name: Running Boards
description: Make your step into your vehicle more comfortable and secure

name: Power Running Boards
description: Elevate convenience and style with our Power Running Boards. Engineered for durability, these automated boards extend and retract smoothly, providing a secure step for easy vehicle entry and exit. Ideal for both daily use and off-road adventures, they seamlessly blend functionality with high-end aesthetics.

name: Bronco Step Rails
description: Enhance your Bronco's utility and style with our Step Rails. Made from durable materials, these rails provide a sturdy and reliable step for easy vehicle access. Their rugged design not only offers improved safety but also complements the adventurous spirit of your Bronco. Ideal for both on-road and off-road use.

name: Solid Fold Tonneau Cover
description: Secure your truck bed with the Solid Fold Tonneau Cover. Made from high-quality, weather-resistant materials, this folding cover offers robust protection for your cargo. The streamlined design not only safeguards against elements but also improves fuel efficiency. Perfect for those seeking both security and style.
